titleStmt.title: Act in favours of these of the Scots nation in Konigsberg, for a voluntar collection. At Edinburgh, the fifteenth day of April, 1697. Years.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.
Church of Scotland. Provincial Synod of Lothian and Tweeddale.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.

The humble and earnest request, of those of the Scots nation resideing in Konigsberg in Prussia; together with the reverend ministers and elders of the Reformed Church there, whereof they are members -- The act of the Provincial Synod of Lothian and Tweeddale for a general collection for the building of a church, to the Scots Reformed Protestants, and others in the city of Konigsberg in Prussia -- Act and recommendation, concerning a collection, for helping to build a church in Konigsberg in Prussia, in pursuance of the act of His Majestie's Privy Council.
